oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Flatt and Scruggs on WFBC-TV Greenville
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl; Metal photoplates; Martha White Foods;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing the WSM Grand Ole Opry stars Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs on WFBC-TV Channel 4. Poster features a metal photoplate of Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs.
